text: Istrian Socialdemocratic Forum (, ) is a regional left-wing political party in Istria County of Croatia. It was founded by dissident faction of Istrian Democratic Assembly and firstly it was named Istrian Democratic Forum, led by Luciano Delbianco, former prefect of Istria County. In the past, it has usually been allied with Social Democratic Party of Croatia, but is currently allied with a number of small leftist parties, such as the Left of Croatia. == Electoral history == === Legislative === {| class="wikitable" |+ !Election !In coalition with !Votes won (coalition totals) !Percentage !Seats won !Change |- |2003 |None |5,685 |0.23% | | |- |2007 |SRP-LH-HSD |9,884 |0.40% | | |} ==Sources== *Istarski demokratski forum (IDF) Category:1996 establishments in Croatia Category:Political parties established in 1996 Category:Regionalist parties in Croatia Category:Social democratic parties in Croatia
title: Istrian Social Democratic Forum
